MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL19 postcode area of Prestatyn, affecting properties in Marine Road and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required in order to repair the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.32PM on 26th November 2020.
